casebody.data:
Jeffrey TILLMAN, Appellant
v.
PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Pennsylvania Board of Probation and Parole, Court of Common Pleas of Lehigh County, Appellees No. 30 MAP 2017 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. March 19, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM

AND NOW , this 19th day of March, 2018, upon consideration of the Motion to Dismiss for Mootness and the "Suggestion of Mootness," this appeal is DISMISSED.
